content: {"name": "Community Assistance Network Food Pantry & Community Resource Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Neighbors must be signed in by 10:45 a.m. for morning pantry distribution, and must be signed in by 2:45 p.m. for afternoon pantry distribution.\nNote: If there is a holiday on a Monday the pantry will be closed and they will then open on that Tuesday from 9 \u2013 10:45 a.m. and then again from 1 \u2013 2:45 p.m.\nDocuments needed for pantry service ( https://www.canconnects.org/_files/ugd/bc52ba_66b5a2dc4a3a447ab737d9d2cb47b94f.pdf)", "email": "", "url": "https://www.canconnects.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "7900 Baltimore Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Baltimore", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21224", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.2994189, "longitude": -76.5147851}, "phones": [{"number": "(410) 285-4674", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "14:45"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "14:45"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "14:45"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "14:45"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:45"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:45"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:45"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:45"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed early if the weather is bad"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
